__e: Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth, so help you God?
I promise on Sacred Bible I won't tell anybody.
I swear on this Holy Bible, as a believing Christian and in the hope of my ultimate salvation, that I have never given my body to any man except my first husband, Francis, and after him, to you.
Father of your child, is his life sacred to you?
This is sacred ground to me, and I don't want too much from life, but I want my wife, and I want my family, and I want this land.
Will you, for the love of all that is holy in your simple little brain, shut the [bleep] up?
You can't go with him, Holy Mother.
I think the Holy Mother wants me alive.
To get in and out of the Holy Mother's camp alive, we need information.
